title: Sitecore Developers
description: Ready for the latest and greatest in the Sitecore world? We've got all the latest news, updates, and industry trends straight from our community.

content.title: Don't miss SUGCON NA 2023!
content.copy: SUGCON will take place next week on October 5th and 6th. Join over 250 Sitecore enthusiasts from different parts of the world, 40+ speakers, and top Sitecore executives such as Sitecore's CEO, Steve-Stathis Tzikakis. Register now spots are limited!

content.title: How to Build Your Own Framework Implementation for Sitecore JSS?
content.copy: Get started understanding what parts of JSS need to be implemented in order to use your favorite framework instead of one of the Sitecore-provided SDKs.

content.title: Digging into Sitecore Content Hub ONE
content.copy: What is a 'pure-play' headless approach and when does Content Hub ONE fit best? How is this different from XM Cloud's headless approach?

content.title: XM Cloud Tutorials - Rename app #4
content.copy: In the last episode Sebastian Winter, showed how to set up a project and an environment within XM Cloud. He also setup a new site and connected the local code running on a local node server to the preview endpoint of XM Cloud so a developer is ready to start.

content.title: I Reviewed 1,000s of Opinions on Serverless
content.copy: What's the state of serverless architecture in 2023? Is it all hype? Is there real 100% objective merit to it? Where does serverless excel? Where do the trade-offs make sense?

content.title: Update on Development Practices for Headless Projects
content.copy: We would like to share some clarification regarding the usage of Helix for Sitecore development in the context of Headless projects.

content.title: Upgrading to Sitecore Headless Services Next.js Version 21.2. A Step-by-Step Guide
content.copy: Improve your site's performance with Sitecore JSS Next.js version 21.2.*. Take full advantage of server-side rendering when using components built with XM Cloud Component Builder starting in the headless services version 21.2.

content.title: XM Cloud Tutorials - Setup XM Cloud #3
content.copy: In this episode Sebastian goes through the steps of a Sprint 0 to get familiar with XM Cloud, the Site creation process and the solution. Learn how to setup the dev environment and connect your codebase running on your local rendering host with the preview endpoint of XM Cloud.

content.title: XM Cloud Tutorials - Serialization #5
content.copy: Everything in XM Cloud is an item: content, configuration, customizations. Some of those items are tightly coupled to functionality provided by developers. So, it makes sense to also have those items serialized as a file in your source code repository, to be under development control.

content.title: Hosting your XM Cloud App on Netlify
content.copy: In this tutorial video, Thomas Desmond demonstrates how to make a production deployment to Netlify for an XM Cloud Next.js application. You'll learn step-by-step instructions for deploying a Sitecore XM Cloud application to Netlify and how to automate Netlify rebuilds on new publishes to Experience Edge.
